name: Lean Link SDK - Community
description:
We want teams to visualise the journey end-users will experience while linking their accounts or making a payment through Link SDK in desktop and mobile applications.


The screens in this file are just an overview and a tool for you to consider the most common scenarios found in our products.


Please note Lean updates the Link SDK regularly and therefore some design elements might be out of date at any time. For further information please refer to our documentation. üëâüèºhttps://docs.leantech.me


Drop us your feedback on the comments so we can keep improving the files.


Version. 1.1.0


Changelog:

  • Added Update payment source method.
